gui

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.MainMenu

  • public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles start page and main menu page GUI first the player is asked to enter a username and then the player is directed to the main page, main menu is also managed here.
